**********************
Player Command *biff*
**********************

Documentation for the biff player command in */cmds/player/biff.c*.

Player Command
==============

See: `mail <mail.html>`_ 


USAGE::

	biff
	biff on
	biff off

 Setting biff on or off will determine whether you receive mail notifications from the in-game
 mail system or not.
